thread.title: BRIEF-EVS Broadcast partners with Imagine Communications
thread.title_full: BRIEF-EVS Broadcast partners with Imagine Communications | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-EVS Broadcast partners with Imagine Communications
text:
Sept 10 EVS Broadcast Equipment SA :
* Teams up with Imagine Communications to deliver end-to-end solution for live production, slow motion and instant replay operations
* Says partnership embraces industry standards for IP signal distribution Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
